title: AgentFacts Universal Metadata Schema v1.0
description: Universal KYA (Know Your Agent) standard for verified AI agent metadata and deployment. Apache 2.0 licensed foundational infrastructure for agent coordination.

core_identity.description: Required unique identification and lifecycle metadata for universal agent coordination

agent_id.description: Unique identifier - supports DID, UUID, URI, or custom schemes. Extensible to any identity standard.

name.description: Human-readable agent identifier. Extensible with internationalization support.

version.description: AgentFacts schema version. Extensible for schema evolution tracking.

created.description: ISO timestamp of initial registration. Extensible with timezone and precision metadata.

last_updated.description: ISO timestamp of most recent update. Extensible with update reason tracking.

ttl.description: Global time-to-live in seconds. Extensible with per-section TTL overrides.
